infoArray.name: selectedParameters
infoArray.desc: Determines the parameters of currently selected stored procedure.

infoArray.name: selectedReturnColumns
infoArray.desc: Determines the selected columns that return from selected stored procedure.

infoArray.name: selectedSp
infoArray.desc: Determines the data object of selected stored procedure.

infoArray.name: dialogStyle
infoArray.desc: Determines the style object for different devices.

infoArray.name: onChange
infoArray.desc: Returns the data object of stored procedure
